name: BASF Personal Care - Barrier Repair Actives
description: BASF, the world's largest chemical company, offers a comprehensive portfolio of barrier repair actives for dermocosmetic applications. Key products include Relipidium™ for long-lasting barrier repair and moisture restoration, Mimiskin™ with advanced nanoparticle technology for barrier protection, and Castaline for atopic-prone skin. Their ingredients are clinically proven to reduce TEWL and restore skin barrier function.
notes: World's largest chemical company with extensive R&D capabilities. Relipidium™ repairs skin barrier and restores moisture long-term. Mimiskin™ uses advanced nanoparticle technology for barrier protection. Comprehensive technical support and clinical data available.
